subject: Add web performance deployment guide (HTTP/3, Early Hints, Brotli/Zstd)
description: Create docs/PERFORMANCE.md (or update README) with deployment recommendations: enable HTTP/3/QUIC, 103 Early Hints for critical assets, and Brotli/Zstandard compression at CDN/reverse proxy. Include when to use each and links to specs; emphasize safe defaults (no caching for user-specific API responses).
